info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 4:30PM EDT until April 06 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Alexander County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northwestern Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... East central Caldwell County in western North Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Taylorsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Taylorsville, Love Valley, Vashti, Hiddenite, Ellendale and Little River In Alexander County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
